name: GospellVideo
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
First, you have to have a GOSPELL webcam and a echo show, and you can add this skill at this time. Add Amazon account to GOSPELL account according to the guidelines.
After successful connection, you can say the following instructions to echo show:
1.Alexa,show baby camera
2.Alexa,hide Basement camera
3.Alexa,stop



If you have problems, you can contact our mailbox
email: goscam_alexa@goscam.com
